steps: step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
step 8: Click on link iPhone15 -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/*'
step 12: Click on link Cart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
step 13: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
step 16: Enter input value in input Email2
step 17: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
step 21: Enter input value in input FirstName2
step 24: Enter input value in input LastName2
step 27: Enter input value in input Address2
step 30: Enter input value in input ZipCode2
step 32: Enter input value in input City2
step 34: Enter input value in input State
step 36: Enter input value in input Phone2
step 37: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
step 38: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you#thank-you/*'
step 39: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
